html:
Amazon Gem

Mofolit Oversized Sectional Sleeper Sofa

Pros
  • Machine washable covers
  • Under $700
  • Deep seats

This is a great example of how a traditional modular couch can serve as a sleeper sofa. Although there isn’t a pull-out bed, you can arrange and rearrange the four quadrants of this Amazon gem in whatever configuration suits you and your guest best.

Dimensions: Length: 143 inches; depth: 40.75 inches

Colors: Grey, Beige

Customer review: “DREAM COUCH! I love the oversize look and feeling. It’s so soft and comfy—perfect for lounging. I love that the cushions can zip right off and be thrown into the washer.”

Hidden Storage

Belffin Modular Chenille Pull-Out Sleeper Sofa

Pros
  • Features storage
  • Machine washable cushion covers
  • Pet-proof
Cons

    It has cup holders and storage—what more do you want? Belffin’s model is extremely versatile. It doesn’t pull out into a mattress, but the long center ottoman stows away when you don’t need that extra depth.

    Dimensions: Length: 103.9 inches; depth: 52.8 inches

    Colors: Graphite Grey, Silver Grey, Misty White

    Customer review: “I like it and so does my cat. Cat scratches don’t really damage it at all!”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Ultra Modern

    Povision Power Sleeper Sofa

    Pros
    • Motorized
    • Remote controlled
    Cons
    • Only one possible configuration

    Unlike many modular styles, you can’t play Tetris with this couch. Still, it has a lot to offer. It’s waterproof, scratch-resistant, and available as a three- or four-seater.

    Dimensions: Length: 93.7 inches; depth: 39.37 inches

    Colors: Beige, Dark Grey, Dark Green

    Customer review: “Absolutely thrilled with my sofa bed purchase! It’s versatile, well-made, and comfortable.”

    Deep Seats

    Perigold Grant 3-Piece Chaise Sectional

    Pros
    • Deep seats
    • Free white glove delivery
    Cons
    • Doesn’t pull out into a bed
    • Only comes in one color

    Gunshenan also recommends looking for couches that have removable back cushions because that will maximize the depth for sleeping guests. As a bonus, this Perigold couch is stain-resistant.

    Dimensions: Length: 112 inches; depth: 112 inches

    Colors: Oat

    Customer review: “Fantastic size, shape, and feel. True to the color as advertised!”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Made to Last

    Article Landry Sleeper Sectional

    Pros
    • Includes memory foam mattress
    Cons
    • Only one possible configuration

    I wouldn’t call this option “modular” in the truest sense of the word, but you can elect to have the chaise on either the right or left side, and it has the classic pull-out mattress that most people associate with sleeper sofas.

    Dimensions: Length: 109 inches; depth: 61.5 inches

    Colors: 12 options

    Customize It

    Coddle Switch Sleeper Sofa

    Pros
    • Motorized
    • Free white glove delivery
    • Pulls out to queen-sized bed
    Cons
    • Limited configurations

    Coddle markets this motorized style by saying, “It’s a sleeper, not a fitness test. You won’t break a sweat converting [it].” And I admire that. The pull-out I grew up with was practically a mousetrap.

    Dimensions: Length: 95.3 inches; depth: 41.3 inches

    Colors: Asphalt, Navy, Ash, Dove, Coral, Charcoal

    Customer review: “We love the size, comfort and heavy duty fabric. The fold-out option is much more comfortable than a traditional sleeper sofa. It’s perfect!”

    Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

    Pit Seating

    Albany Park Kova Pit

    Pros
    • Customizable and made-to-order
    • Optional storage ottoman
    • Lifetime warranty
    • Removable, cleanable cushion covers
    • Deep pit seats
    Cons
    • Depth might make it difficult for some people to get up from it
    • Doesn’t pull out to bed

    Pit-style couches are the best way to provide sleep space without an actual mattress. And as far as pits go, this one is top of the line. It’s made-to-order, so you can customize the performance fabric, cushion type, storage features, size, and configuration.

    Dimensions: Length: 122 inches; depth: 79 inches

    Colors: 31 options

    Customer review: “Absolutely LOVE! It is HUGE and was easy to put together. I’ve fallen asleep on it plenty of times and still wake up refreshed like I was in a bed. Highly recommend!”

    Best Seller

    West Elm Harmony Modular 2-Piece Sleeper Sectional w/ Storage Chaise

    Pros
    • Storage
    • Plenty of color and fabric options
    • Pulls out to a queen-sized bed
    • Included memory foam mattress
    Cons

      West Elm offers a true unicorn with this one. The traditional Harmony modular sofa is consistently a bestseller among ELLE readers, so I predict you’ll love this version just as much.

      Dimensions: Length: 123 inches; depth: 69 inches

      Colors: 32 options

      Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

      Free Shipping

      Latitude Run Oversized Square Arm Sleeper Sofa

      Pros
      • Oversized seats
      • Great reviews
      Cons
      • Some customers say it sits too low to the ground
      • Only one possible configuration

      Wayfair has several pit-style options at prices of $1,500 or less, but this is the best by my evaluation, thanks to its oversized cushions.

      Dimensions: Length: 89.8 inches; depth: 54.3 inches

      Colors: Grey, Green, Black, Beige

      Customer review: “Beautiful. Now we call my son’s old bedroom the ZEN room. It’s my favorite room in the house now.”

      Meet the Expert

      • Elisabeth Gunshenan is a design consultant for Wayfair and Perigold Design Services.
